text: Julio Luis Cruz (December 2, 1954 â€“ February 22, 2022) was an American professional baseball second baseman. He played for the Seattle Mariners and Chicago White Sox of Major League Baseball from 1977 until 1986. Cruz died on February 22, 2022, at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Seattle Mariners players Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn
